excerpt.rendered:
features of Abran Fabric Sofa

  • Upholstery Material: The upholstery is made from breathable 100% polyester fabric. Polyester is a synthetic material known for its durability and resistance to wrinkles and fading. The breathable aspect suggests that it allows for good air circulation, which can enhance comfort.
  • Frame: The frame of the furniture is constructed with laminated veneer and solid wood. This combination of materials is chosen for its durability. Laminated veneers provide stability, while solid wood adds strength and structural integrity.
  • Seat: The seat features high resilience polyurethane density foam with pocketed springs. This combination offers both comfort and support.
  • Back: The back of the furniture comprises micro polyester fine fiber and polyurethane density foam. This combination is designed to provide support and relaxation. The use of polyurethane density foam can offer a comfortable yet supportive backrest.
  • Legs: The legs of the furniture are finished with a sleek Shine metal powder coating. This coating not only adds a contemporary touch to the design but also provides protection and durability to the legs.

*Note: All Of Our Items Are Made to Order.*
